data.title: rolling papers 2
data.text:
Wiz Khalifa’s Rolling Papers 2 Debuts at #2 On Billboard, Drake Holds Top Spot

Wiz Khalifa’s Rolling Papers 2 locked up the number 2 spot on the Billboard 200 in its first week. Named as the sequel to Khalifa’s Atlantic Records debut album, the Taylor Gang rapper sold 80,000 copies of what is his sixth studio album. Drake’s Scorpion still holds the top spot for the third week in […]

Wiz Khalifa Responds to Criticism of Koreans Bar on ‘Hot Now’ Single

Wiz Khalifa returned to the Hip-Hop scene this past week with his new album Rolling Papers 2. He will be touring the album and other songs from his catalog across the country for the rest of the summer but one of the album’s singles is receiving some backlash and Wiz isn’t worried about it. Visit […]

Wiz Khalifa’s ‘Rolling Papers 2’ Is Out Now

Rolling Papers 2 has finally arrived. The sequel to Wiz Khalifa’s third album features Ty Dolla $ign, Gucci Mane, Swae Lee and more. ROLLING PAPERS 2 OUT NOW ?‼️ link in bio‼️PAPERS 2 ? A post shared by Wiz Khalifa (@wizkhalifa) on Jul 12, 2018 at 9:20pm PDT Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information In 2011, […]

Wiz Khalifa Releases Cover Art For ‘Rolling Papers 2’

Wiz Khalifa has been pioneering the music industry for 10+ years now with a hometown anthem in honor of Pittsburg’s 2011 Super Bowl Championship win, moving on to now preparing to release his seventh studio album, Rolling Papers 2. For a couple of years now, Wiz has been tossing out hints that the Rolling Papers […]

Wiz Khalifa Teams Up With Rae Sremmurd for ‘Dazed & Blazed’ Parody Video

The Dazed & Blazed Tour is kicking off the 21st of July in Detroit and it ends August 30th. Wiz Khalifa’s line up consists of cities such as Chicago, Houston, Atlanta, Austin, and New York. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information The tour complements his highly anticipated project, Rolling Papers 2, set to release July 13th. […]

Wiz Khalifa Teases ‘Best Life’ Track Produced by TM88

Wiz Khalifa previewed his new TM88 produced track “Best Life”, early this morning featuring Taylor Gang artist, Sosamann. Wiz in tandem teased the video for the song from inside the studio where the track may have been recorded. It is unknown if this track will be on an upcoming project, but Wiz has said previously […]

Wiz Khalifa is Releasing a Mixtape Before His Next Album

Wiz Khalifa is making a return from hiatus and Taylor Gang is happy AF. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information The “Black and Yellow” rapper revealed that he will be releasing a mixtape preceding Rolling Papers 2, titled Laugh Now, Fly Later. Laugh Now, Fly Later. https://t.co/miZDxtQjBN — Wiz Khalifa (@wizkhalifa) October 15, 2017 Advertisement November 10th. […]

Watch Wiz Khalifa’s New Video “Pull Up” Featuring Lil’ Uzi Vert

Back in May, Wiz Khalifa gave fans his song “Pull Up” featuring Lil’ Uzi Vert from his upcoming album, Rolling Papers 2. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information The video is very fitting, with Uzi shining on ’em from the rooftop while Wiz rides around Los Angeles in an old school Chevy. We can expect Rolling Papers 2 to be releasing […]

Wiz Khalifa To Drop New Music This Week, Gives Album Update

Wiz Khalifa doesn’t stay away from the studio for long; he’s already put out two albums this year. He dropped his solo effort Khalifa earlier in the year, and then he followed that release with a joint album featuring Juicy J and TM88. Now he’s preparing to roll out another album soon. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information Rumored […]

Wiz Khalifa’s Dropping ‘Rolling Papers 2’ Before Summer

Wiz Khalifa‘s about to set 2016 ablaze. With his new album, Khalifa – comprised of some of his most potent unreleased material from throughout his career – set to arrive this Friday with features from Juicy J, Ty Dolla $ign, Chevy Woods, and his son Sebastian; having already spawned the Travis Scott-assisted single, “Bake Sale,” […]

Wiz Khalifa Shares Tracklist and New Release Date for ‘Khalifa’ Album, Features Son Sebastian

Following the highly-anticipated release of “Bake Sale,” his collaboration with Travis Scott featuring production from Juicy J among others, Wiz Khalifa has shared the entire tracklist, as well as a new release date, for his upcoming album, Khalifa. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information Originally expected to drop today, according to statements Wiz made while on […]

Wiz Khalifa Announces ‘KHALIFA’ Release Date

Details surrounding Wiz Khalifa‘s upcoming album, KHALIFA, continue to emerge. During his trip down the red carpet at Sunday’s Golden Globes, the rapper – nominated for Best Original Song with “See You Again” from Furious 7 – revealed to E! host Giuliana Rancic that the prequel to Rolling Papers 2 will officially arrive on January […]

Wiz Khalifa Takes His Throne in “King of Everything”

Heavy is the head that wears the crown. Having paid the cost to be the boss time and time again, Wiz Khalifa finally receives royal treatment and has the red carpet rolled out in the powerful video for “King of Everything” produced by Cozmo and ID Labs, which – along with the similarly-released “No Social […]

Wiz Khalifa Announces ‘Khalifa’ Project

Still blazin’. Having released yet another wildly successful mixtape Cabin Fever 3 less than a mere two weeks ago, it appears Wiz Khalifa‘s just warming up as we await the launch of his fourth major label album Rolling Papers 2, due later in 2016. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information In a video message uploaded to […]

Wiz Khalifa and Curren$y Stay Ahead of the Curve on “Prequel”

Ahead of the curve. While hindsight is often considered to be 20/20, Wiz Khalifa refuses to get stuck behind the eight ball and looks to the future on “Prequel,” a cautious collaboration with Curren$y from the Taylor Gang leader’s brand new mixtape Cabin Fever 3, which itself precedes his upcoming fourth album Rolling Papers 2.
